title: Stay Still
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>So fluffy~~~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ehehe~, Kanata loves having Kanata’s hair played with~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>For me, I love touching other people’s hair<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Fufufu<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Fufufu<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hanayo-chan, do you do this with other people in μ’s too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah. The other day, I got to touch Maki-chan’s hair with Rin-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Oooh, how was it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>It was smooth, glossy, and smelled nice~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Then Kanata would like to touch her hair too….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ah-, don’t move yet! I’m tying up your hair in a bun shape~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
